PHRASE.LANG: Feel free to lounge wherever you please in PlayStation®Home with this new pop-up chair locomotion from nDreams - includes several cool poses to choose from! [#Legal]

Accomodati ovunque vuoi in PlayStation®Home con queste nuove sedie a comparsa di nDreams. Il pacchetto include parecchie pose fantastiche tra cui scegliere! [#Legal]

No dudes en holgazanear en cualquier lado de PlayStation®Home con esta locomoción de nDreams en forma de silla emergente. ¡Incluye varias poses chulísimas para que elijas la que más te guste! [#Legal]
Feel free to lounge wherever you please in PlayStation®Home with this new pop-up chair locomotion from nDreams - includes several cool poses to choose from! [#Legal]
